# ooder Guides

Welcome to the ooder guides section. This collection of guides will help you effectively use and extend the library for your projects.

## üìö Available Guides

### Getting Started
- **[Installation Guide](./getting-started.md)** - How to install and set up the library
- **[Quick Start](./quick-start.md)** - Build your first application
- **[Basic Concepts](./basic-concepts.md)** - Understanding the ooder architecture

### Component Usage
- **[Buttons](./components/button.md)** - Different button types and usage
- **[Forms](./components/forms.md)** - Building forms with validation
- **[Layouts](./components/layouts.md)** - Responsive layout components
- **[Dialogs](./components/dialogs.md)** - Modal and non-modal dialogs
- **[Data Display](./components/data-display.md)** - Lists, grids, and data visualization

### Advanced Topics
- **[Custom Components](./advanced/custom-components.md)** - Extending and creating new components
- **[Performance Optimization](./advanced/performance.md)** - Best practices for fast applications
- **[Accessibility](./advanced/accessibility.md)** - Making components accessible
- **[Internationalization](./advanced/i18n.md)** - Supporting multiple languages

### Development Workflow
- **[Testing Components](./development/testing.md)** - Writing tests for UI components
- **[Debugging](./development/debugging.md)** - Debugging techniques and tools
- **[Build Configuration](./development/build-config.md)** - Customizing the build process

## üéØ Learning Paths

### For Beginners
1. Start with **[Getting Started](./getting-started.md)**
2. Learn about **[Basic Concepts](./basic-concepts.md)**
3. Try the **[Quick Start](./quick-start.md)** example
4. Explore basic components like **[Buttons](./components/button.md)**

### For Intermediate Developers
1. Master **[Form Components](./components/forms.md)**
2. Learn about **[Layout Systems](./components/layouts.md)**
3. Explore **[Custom Components](./advanced/custom-components.md)**
4. Understand **[Performance Optimization](./advanced/performance.md)**

### For Advanced Users
1. Dive into **[Accessibility](./advanced/accessibility.md)**
2. Implement **[Internationalization](./advanced/i18n.md)**
3. Contribute to the library via **[Contribution Guide](../../CONTRIBUTING.md)**

## üîß Practical Examples

Each guide includes practical examples that you can run directly. Look for the "Try It" sections in each guide.

### Example Structure
```javascript
// Example code blocks are provided
import { Button, Input } from 'ooder';

// Complete working examples
const example = new ExampleComponent({
  // Configuration
});
```

## üß™ Interactive Learning

### Code Sandbox
Some guides include links to CodeSandbox where you can experiment with components in a live environment.

### Component Playground
Visit the `examples/` directory in the project root for interactive component demos.
